description: Bid for the Phase 1 Remediation Services for Eureka, NU, including site remediation activities, for the Eureka High Arctic Weather Station (HAWS).
tags: Inorganic hazardous waste collection and disposal
full_summary:
**Title**
EW699-231052 Phase 1 Remediation Services Eureka, Nunavut

**Reference Number**
WS3764580204-Doc3764708701

**Publication Date**
24 November 2022

**Tender Closing Date**
03 January 2023, 2:00 PM Central Standard Time (CST)

**Summary**
The [Department of Public Works and Government Services] seeks to engage a qualified supplier to provide Phase 1 Remediation Services at the Eureka High Arctic Weather Station (HAWS) in Nunavut. This tender is the first phase of a two-phase process. Phase 1 will assess the qualifications of interested suppliers, and Phase 2 will invite qualified suppliers to submit a financial bid.

**Scope of Work**
The scope of work includes hazardous material decontamination, hazardous waste disposal, and inorganic hazardous waste collection and disposal.

**Key Dates**

* Expected Contract Start Date: 27 December 2022
* Expected Contract End Date: 01 April 2026

**Notice Type and Category**
This tender is an Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) under the Competitive – Open Bidding procurement method.

**Trade Agreements**
This tender opportunity is open to suppliers eligible for the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

**Inquiries and Submissions**
For further information, please contact Danielle Graham, [SPAC/PSPC], at danielle.graham@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. Suppliers must submit their bid through SAP Ariba using the following link: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14730036.

**Key Contracting Information**

* Consigning Party: Department of Public Works and Government Services
* Contract Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
* End Use: Department of Public Works and Government Services
